column4: hello, can someone help me please .. how can i toggle between keyboard layouts on Ubuntu ?
it's  a tool that lets you browse the gnome configuration tree. Apps, Desktop, volumes mounted on the desktop, wireless setup and more
i need to know how i can toggle between keyboard layouts does Gconf-editor can help me ?
right click the panel, add the keboard indicator. Then, in system->prefs->keyboard, layouts tab, add the layouts you want
